title: Do the owners of The Beach 94.1 FM WLSG  plan on moving to a taller tower to improve reception in Wilmington?  I love the station but it is hard to listen to when driving around the city because of the weak signal.
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/2016/12/do-the-owners-of-the-beach-94-1-fm-wlsg-plan-on-moving-to-a-taller-tower-to-improve-reception-in-wilmington/
